A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The final half is entertaining. The first half has horrible pacing . Luke's storyline is a disappointment for anyone who hoped for an epic return and/or send-off (some may disagree). Snoke is an underutilized character. The movie lacks heart. Left a bad taste in my mouth  and I'm not excited for what is to come. Very\, very disappointed with the direction the took.
